method: 1. Soak coral mushrooms till soft, then cut it into small pieces and remove the stem. Soak the black mushroom till soft, then remove the stem and cut it.
2. In a wok add oil. Put chopped garlic and stir till light brown. Add the onions, red capsicum, green capsicum and whole red chilli. Saute lightly.
3. Add chicken slices to it and all the sauces (fish sauce, oyster sauce, lemon juice) and sugar.
4. Add the spring onion, cashewnuts, tomatoes, riped mango, black pepper, black mushrooms and coral mushrooms. Adjust for salt.
5. Serve.

title: Tapioca Dumplings Recipe
method: 1. In a mortar and pestle, grind the peppercorns, coriander, garlic and salt and form a paste.
2. In a pan, heat oil, fry the paste for about a minute.
3. Then on high heat, add the onions and the chicken, and stir-fry till it's all crumbly.
4. Add the peanuts, brown sugar. Give it a quick stir so that the sugar caramelizes.
5. Add the fish sauce and mix well.
6. Stir for a few minutes more and take off the heat.

1. For the tapioca shell, mix the tapioca pearls and tapioca flour in boiling water, while stirring constantly. Knead the dough a bit but very gently, do not mash the pearls. It will be sticky and allow it to cool.
2. Dip your fingers in a bowl of cold water. Take a pinch of the tapioca dough, roll into a ball.
3. Then flatten it and fill it with the chicken filling.
4. Steam the dumplings.
5. Optional - you can drizzle a bit of garlic oil on top or black sesame seeds. Also instead of the tapioca covering you can use spinach leaves to wrap the filling.

title: Andhra Style Chicken Curry Recipe

ingredient.description: kg chicken (cut into bite size pieces)
tbsp cashew nuts - poppy seed paste (Soak 15 cashews and 1 Tbsp poppy seed in a cup of milk for an hour. Grind it into a paste.)

method: 1. In a wok add refined oil. Add a bay leaf, green cardamom, cloves, cinnamon. Let them release the aroma.
2. Now add onions. Saute till golden brown and then add the ginger-garlic paste. Mix and add the chicken pieces. Saute till they start to color a bit.
3. Now add the turmeric and salt. Toss and add water.
4. Add the green chilli and curry leaves. Let the curry simmer.

5. Add the red chilli powder, cashew nut -poppy seed paste, chicken masala, kasoori methi, garam masala and dhaniya powder. Mix well and let the curry simmer till the chicken is cooked. Add more water if required.
6. Garnish with coriander leaves and serve with steamed rice.

title: Handi Komdi Recipe

ingredient.description: free range chicken, cut into small chunks
Tbsp hara masala (2 cloves garlic, 1/2 cup coriander, 1 small knob ginger, 2 green chillies)

method: 1. Marinate the chicken pieces in salt, red chilli powder, turmeric powder and garam masala.
2. In a pot add peanut oil. Add the hara masala. Saute.
3. Now add the marinated chicken. Saute for 4-5 minutes.
4. Add the water (enough to cover the chicken pieces). Cover and cook for 20 minutes or till the chicken is well done and the water has reduced a little.
5. Serve with steamed rice.

title: Himachali Tawa Murgh Recipe
method: 1. In a grinder, grind a semi-fine powder of all the ingredients.
2. You may or may not dry roast these before grinding.
1. Marinate the chicken pieces with turmeric powder, ginger-garlic paste, salt, cream, hung curd and garam masala.
2. Mix them well, cover and keep it in the fridge for 1 hour.
1. In a pan add oil.
2. Place the marinated chicken pieces in the pan and cook.
3. Cover the pan and let the chicken cook til tender and brown.
1. In a small pan add oil, dried red chillies and coriander leaves. Saute a bit.
2. Sprinkle some garam masala and some lemon juice on top of the chicken. Pour the prepared tadka over.
3. Serve.

title: Chicken Balls in Yakitori Sauce Recipe

ingredient.description: kg chicken mince (chicken legs with skin)
tsp oil, to grill the chicken balls

method: 1. In the chicken mince add chopped onions, carrots, mushrooms and lemon rind.
2. Mix in the egg whites (mix with hands). Add soya, mirin, sake and sesame seeds.
3. Press with hands and make small balls out of this mixture.
4. Steam for eight minutes and skewer on to wooden bamboo sticks.
5. Grill with 1/2 tsp oil.
6. Dip in yakitori sauce and serve.
1. Take a thick bottomed pan and boil the mirin. When boiling, flame it till all alcohol burns off.
2. Mix soya, sugar, sake and add to the reduced mirin.
3. Cut the ginger, carrots, apple, celery into 1 inch cubes and throw in sauce.
4. Blanch the chicken bones in boiling water and add to sauce.
5. Cook 1 hour and thicken with cornflour.

title: Rice Noodles with Stir Fried Chicken Recipe
method: 1. In a pan add oil, onions, capsicum, yellow bell peppers. Saute. s
2. Add the Chinese cabbage, minced garlic and salt. Keep aside. s
1. In a bowl marinate the chicken and calamari with soya sauce, oyster sauce, lemon juice. s
2. Stir fry it in a pan with some oil till done. s
1. In the pan with the stir fried chicken add the rice noodles and stir fried vegetables. s
2. Add soya sauce, lime juice, red chillies. Toss and add coriander leaves. s
3. Garnish with toasted peanuts and spring onion greens. s
4. Serve. s

title: Kerala Chicken Roast Recipe
method: 1. Clean and cut the chicken into medium sized pieces. Make a paste of all the ingredients under marination.
2. Marinate the chicken pieces with this paste and keep aside for an hour.
3. Cut onions into very thin slices and fry in hot oil. Drain them and keep aside.
4. Fry the chicken pieces in the same oil until almost done. Keep the pan covered so that the chicken does not get browned, but is cooked inside. Drain them and keep aside.
5. Heat 2 tbsp of oil in another pan (You can use the same oil in which we fried the chicken pieces. This will enhance the flavour). Add slit green chillies and curry leaves. Saute for 1 minute.
6. Add the tomato paste to this and saute for 1 minute. Now add the prepared chicken & roast until it is dry.
7. Make sure that all the chicken pieces are well coated with the tomato paste.
8. Sprinkle garam masala & pepper powder and mix well.
9. Add lemon juice and mix well. Check for salt. Add a little if needed. Now add the fried onions and mix well.
10. Tasty Kerala chicken roast is ready.

title: Kashmiri Chicken Pulao Recipe
method: 1. Take rice, wash it properly and soak it in some water for 20 minutes.
2. Take 6-7 chicken thighs and cut it into even size pieces
3. Now wash these pieces well and drain the excessive water out, nicely.
4. Take 1 cup of yogurt and add salt, 1 tsp red chilli powder, 1 tsp turmeric powder, 3 tsp coriander seed powder and 1 tsp black pepper powder
5. Whisk the yogurt nicely and keep it aside.
6. Heat 2 tbsp desi ghee in a pan, add 4-5 cloves of garlic, add 5-6 cloves, a cup of onions and saute.
7. Now add the ginger and 5-6 green chillies and saute.
8. Now add the whisked yogurt mixture and saute well.
9. Cook for a few minutes and once you see the specs of fat coming up, add the chicken pieces.
10. Add some salt too at this stage.
11. Cook for a minute and add 2 cups of water and leave it to boil. Use enough of water because the rice will be cooked in this.
12. Let it simmer for a couple of minutes. When the chicken is cooked, add the rice to the chicken and allow it to cook.
13. Gently stir the rice because basmati after soaking becomes very fragile.
14. Once the rice is cooked, serve hot.

title: Chicken Dum Biryani Recipe

ingredient.description: cup Rice (long grain, washed basmati rice)

method: 1. First mix the saffron in half a cup of milk and keep aside.
2. Now in a bowl, add all the marination ingredients and coat the chicken pieces well with it. Let it marinate for about 4 hours.
3. Now to prepare the rice, put all the ingredients given except saffron and milk, in warm water along with washed rice.
4. Cook for 10-15 minutes.
5. Heat some ghee in a pan and add all the marinated chicken followed by cooked rice in it. Top with saffron milk, coriander leaves, fried onion and chopped almonds. Mix well.
6. Let it cook on a low heat (on dum, in it's own heat) covered with foil for about 20-30 minutes (till the water evaporates and chicken and rice are fully cooked).
7. Open the dum when cooked, mix the rice well. You can drizzle with some rose water and serve hot.

title: Chicken Mascarpone Recipe

ingredient.description: A pinch of red chilly flakes

method: 1. In a mixing bowl mix oil, parsley salt, pepper and minced garlic.
2. Coat the chicken breast evenly with this marinade.
3. Slit the chicken breast length ways to create a pocket.
4. Put a spoon of mascarpone and place the ham slice and close it with a toothpick.
5. Repeat with all the chicken breasts. Keep aside.
1. In a pan melt the oil and butter, add the wine, chicken stock and lemon juice.
2. Throw in the chilly flakes, season with salt and let it simmer while the chicken is being cooked.
3. You can cook the chicken in the oven at 200 degree Celsius for about 10-12 minutes or until cooked or over a pan or on a barbecue, pour a spoon of sauce and serve.

title: Chicken Xacuti Recipe
method: 1. Add salt and turmeric powder to curry-cut chicken.
2. Add paste 1 of ginger, garlic, coriander, chillies and marinate for half an hour.
3. To make paste 2, heat oil in pan and saute sliced onions, green chillies, ginger, garlic for 3 minutes.
4. Add 1 grated coconut and saute for another 5-7 minutes. Once onions are crispy, keep aside.
5. To make paste 3, on a dry pan separately roast cinnamon, cardamom, aniseed, black pepper corn, poppy seeds, coriander seeds, Kashmiri red chillies, star anise, maize flower, nutmeg, and turmeric.
6. Make Xacuti masala by grinding together paste 2 and 3.
7. For the final preparation, heat oil in pan and add onions and green chillies.
8. After one minute add the marinated chicken pieces.
9. After two minutes add Xacuti masala and water. Cook for 10 minutes.
10. Serve hot with bread or rice.

title: Low Fat Butter Chicken Recipe

ingredient.description: tsp red chilli or more if you want it really spicy
3-4 Green chillies (slit from the middle and de seeded)

method: 1. Take a pan and put 2 tsp oil. Not too much cause there will be oil coming out of chicken as well.
2. Now add onion cut in long slices, cinnamon, tej pata, cardamom, garlic paste. Saute all this in oil nicely til the onion gets little brown.
3. close your gas and let the onions cool. Once they are little cool, churn / blend all this with chopped tomatoes and the curd / yogurt till you have a smooth paste.
4. Note: Do not wash the pan in which onion was cooked before and let the left over oil of onions be in the pan.
5. Now take the earlier pan and saute chicken in left over oil of onion.
6. After chicken is almost done, add the onion, tomato/curd paste with chicken and cook.
7. Add salt to taste, red chilli, coriander powder, haldi, green chillies.
8. Finally let chicken get cook until the oil comes out and starts floating on the top.
9. The color of the tomatoes should change to a nice red by now.
10. Garnish it with coriander before serving.

title: Chicken Ham Sandwich Recipe
method: 1. On a slice of brown bread slather mustard sauce.
2. Lay down a slice of chicken ham, 3 tomato slices and a lettuce leaf.
3. Cover the sandwich with another bread slice with a little mustard on it.
4. Repeat this process to make another sandwich.
5. Serve.

title: Raan Musallam Recipe

ingredient.description: gms ginger, garlic and green chilli paste
gms poppy seed, coconut and cashew nut paste

method: 1. In a pan, dry roast the bay leaf, cinnamon, brown cardamom, green cardamom, mace, black pepper, cumin seeds and whole coriander seeds.
2. Transfer them into mortar and pestle, grind them finely to make fresh garam masala.

3. In a bowl, mix ginger garlic and chilli paste, hung curd, red chilli powder, turmeric powder, ground poppy coconut cashew nut paste, fried onions, ground garam masala and butter. This is your marinade.
4. First, apply mustard oil to the chicken breasts and then marinate them.
5. Next, marinate the raan, place the chicken breasts on it and add a layer of cashew nut and raisins.
6. Tie and roll up the raan and chicken breast together with the help of a thread.
7. Cook the the stuffed raan, in ghee, on a slow fire. Once both the sides of the raan are seared, cover and let it cook for an hour.
8. With the remaining marinade, make a quick gravy by cooking it out in mustard oil and adding a little water to it.
9. Ladle the gravy on to the cooked Raan.
10. Garnish with lime, sprinkle raisins, cashew nuts and fried onions.
11. Serve hot!

title: Grilled Chicken in Mustard Sauce Recipe
method: 1. Put each chicken breast half between two sheets of plastic wrap; pound lightly to flatten evenly.
2. Salt and pepper both sides of the chicken pieces.
3. Lightly oil the grill or grill pan. Grill over a medium-high heat for about 3 to 4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through and set-aside.
4. In a frying pan, heat the butter and fry the onion until soft and transparent.
5. Add the wine and boil rapidly until reduced to a quarter of the original amount.
6. Stir in the cream and mustard and continue to cook until thickened.
7. Season with the salt and pepper.
8. Place the chicken on a plate and spoon the sauce over the chicken.

title: Chicken in Barbecue Sauce Recipe

ingredient.description: Salt and freshly milled black pepper

method: 1. In a small bowl, mix the olive oil with lemon juice. Place the chicken joints in a roasting tin with the onion and the salt and black pepper.
2. Brush the chicken pieces with the oil and lemon juice dressing. Cover the top of the roasting tin with cling film and place in the refrigerator for 30 minutes.
3. Then, when you are ready to cook the chicken, preheat the oven to gas mark 6/400 degree F (200 c). Remove the cling film and place the roasting tin on a high shelf and cook for 25 minutes.

4. Meanwhile combine the entire sauce ingredients in a jug and whisk everything together thoroughly. When the chicken is done remove the roasting tin from the oven and pour the sauce all over giving the joints a good coating.
5. Return the chicken to the oven and cook for about another 25 minutes. Serve the chicken with some of the sauce spooned over. This can be eaten with plain basmati rice.

title: Chicken in White Wine Recipe

ingredient.description: 10-12 small onions or shallots (cut in half)
gms boneless and skinless chicken breasts (chopped into 3cm pieces)
Fresh thyme sprigs (washed or 1/2 tsp dried thyme)

method: 1. Preheat the oven to 200C.
2. Mix the pepper with the flour and coat the chicken pieces thoroughly.
3. Set aside.
4. Heat a large frying pan on a medium heat. Add 2 tbsp of oil and when it becomes hot, tip in the bacon. Fry until it becomes brown.
5. Then tip in the onions and fry till they turn golden brown on the outside. Add the mushrooms and fry for 2 minutes.
6. Transfer the bacon, onions and mushrooms into a heatproof casserole dish with a lid.
7. Add the remaining oil and the butter in the frying pan and fry the chicken 5-7 minutes until it is browned on the outside. Place the chicken in the casserole with the vegetables.
8. Pour the wine into the frying pan and bring to the boil scraping any sediment from the bottom of the pan, then pour over the ingredients in the casserole.
9. Place the chicken stock, garlic, bay leaves and thyme in the fry pan and bring to the boil.
10. Add the stock and herbs to the chicken.
11. Cover the casserole dish and cook in the oven for 1 hour or until the chicken is tender.
12. Serve with boiled potatoes and carrots.

title: Achaari Murgh with Desi Ghee Khichdi Recipe

ingredient.description: A pinch of Kashmiri red chilli powder

method: 1. Cut chicken into small chunks and marinate with salt, ginger paste, garlic paste and little oil.
2. Cook in tandoor or oven till half done.
3. Blitz red chilli pickle to make a fine paste. Keep aside.
4. Take oil in a non stick pan. Add the chopped ginger, garlic and green chilli. Saute it for a minute.
5. Add red chilli pickle paste and little water. Adjust the seasoning. Simmer to adjust the consistency of masala.
6. Add half-cooked chicken pieces and toss till it coats the masala and chicken is well cooked.
7. Finish the achari murgh with chopped coriander and lemon juice.
8. Garnish with hung curd.
1. Wash dal and rice and cook together in pressure cooker with water, salt and turmeric powder.
2. Take half desi ghee in a non-stick pan. Add cumin seeds, allow them to crackle. Add chopped ginger, garlic and green chilli. Saute.
3. Add cooked khichdi in masala and cook it further by adding little water.
4. Add kashmiri red chilli powder, salt and chaat masala (optional) to adjust the seasoning.
5. Finish the khichdi with chopped coriander, lemon juice and remaining desi ghee.
6. Fry the banarsi aloo papad and serve along with achari murgh and desi ghee khichdi, with hung curd garnish and masala moong dal on the side.

title: Coconut Chicken Curry Recipe
method: 1. Add chicken, garlic and ginger paste, turmeric powder, salt, garam masala, salt and chilli powder and mix well. Keep the marinated chicken for two hours.
2. Then place the pan on fire and put the oil/butter and fry the onion till golden brown.
3. Add the marinated chicken to the pan and fry on a low flame adding coconut milk slowly till the chicken is cooked properly.
4. Then mix the cream slowly.
5. Add 1/2 tsp of sugar (optional). Mix.
6. Now the chicken is ready to eat.
7. Serve with roti/rice.

title: Chicken Butter Masala Recipe
method: 1. Heat oil in a wok.
2. Add ginger-garlic paste and chicken.
3. Fry till chicken changes colour to golden brown.
4. Add butter to chicken in the pan and then add blended tomatoes.
5. Stir on heat for 2-3 minutes.
6. Add red chilli powder, turmeric powder, curry powder, salt and stir lightly till oil separates. Add kasturi methi.
7. Slowly add cream. Add ginger juliennes and cover with lid for few minutes.
8. Garnish with green chillies, green coriander and serve with boiled rice.

title: Chicken Pakoda Recipe
method: 1. Marinate chicken with salt and ginger-garlic paste and leave for 10 minutes.
2. In a separate bowl, mix the other ingredients.
3. Make batter by adding water.
4. Dip chicken pieces in batter and deep fry.
5. You can serve with green chutney.

title: Nimbu Hari Mirch Ka Murgh Recipe
method: 1. Heat desi ghee. Add ginger garlic paste. Stir fry until it releases aroma.
2. Add onion puree and chicken.
3. Add the dry spices - turmeric powder, coriander powder, yellow chilli powder, garam masala and salt.
4. Add yogurt and stir fry until they blend well to form a thick gravy.
5. Now add the lemon pickle along with malt vinegar. Mix well with the chicken.
6. Add the green chillies into this gravy and stir well.
7. Add kasoori methi and finish with fresh cream to give a nice blend of the gravy to the dish.
8. Garnish with fresh coriander & serve hot.

title: Oriental Basil Chicken Recipe
method: 1. Crush some garlic, green chillies and red chillies together.
2. Heat the pan with oil for few minutes.
3. Add the smashed garlic and chillies in the preheated pan. When garlic starts to turn brown, add the chicken and stir for a few minutes.
4. The juice from the chicken will eventually start coming out. Keep stirring until all the juice is
5. absorbed. It will take a couple of minutes.
6. Add oyster sauce and light soya sauce. Then add basil leaves to it.
7. Quickly turn it over a few times to mix the leaves with the meat and then add castor sugar to it.
8. Mix it well for few minutes and remove from the fire.
9. Serve hot.

title: Chicken Chaska From Gawal Mandi Recipe
method: 1. Put chicken on a hot plate with few drops of oil and butter. Then cook chicken to half on slow heat.
2. When chicken is half ready, cut it in desired shape.
3. Make a paste of the ingredients mentioned in a grinder.
4. Then add this paste to the chicken on the hot plate itself, and cook fully.
5. Remove from heat and serve with tawa fry vegetables.
1. On a hot plate, heat oil.
2. Add all the vegetables, salt, black pepper and roasted garlic.
3. Stir fry.

title: Chicken Kolhapuri Recipe
method: 1. Marinate the chicken with chilli powder, turmeric powder, ginger and garlic pastes. Leave for 15-20 minutes.
2. Roast the cumin seeds, coriander seeds, fenugreek seeds, poppy seeds, sesame seeds, coconut, cloves, green cardamom, black pepper and cinnamon.
3. In a mixer, add fried onions and all the roasted spices. Make a smooth paste with some water.
4. In a pan heat oil, add ginger paste, garlic paste, asafoetida, dry red chillies, turmeric powder and tomato. Then add the ground paste.
5. Saute for some time and add chicken.
6. Saute for another 2 minutes, then add water and cook on a slow flame till chicken is cooked.
7. Add lemon juice and finish with coriander leaves.
1. Mix the three flours, salt and knead dough with water.
2. Roll and bake on the flat tawa.
3. Finish with butter.
1. Julienne onion, tomato, cucumber.
2. Squeeze lemon juice and season.
3. Add coriander leaves and green chillies.

title: Chicken Khada Masala Recipe
method: 1. Wash the chicken.
2. Put ghee in a pot and saute onions.
3. Then put yogurt, then green chilli paste and white pepper powder and salt.
4. Cook for 10 minutes. Cool and blend in blender.
5. Again, put ghee, ginger, garlic and saute chicken.
6. Add the paste and cook.
7. Now put the whole spices, except cumin and red chilli.
8. Cook for 10 minutes and finally give a tadka or tempering of cumin seeds and whole red chillies.
9. Serve with boiled rice.

title: Murgh Makhanwala Recipe

ingredient.description: kg chicken cubes, boneless (leg and breast)
cup coconut cream or coconut milk

method: 1. Grill the chicken cubes rubbed with salt.
2. Put desi ghee and white butter, and saute all the spices well along with green chilli paste, ginger, garlic, brown onion, tomatoes and cashewnuts.
3. Then put the grilled chicken and steam for 20 mins.
4. Add coconut cream or milk and cook for 10 minutes.
5. Then add desiccated coconut, mix and it is done.

title: Enchiladas Recipe
method: 1. Take the chicken in a bowl, and add lemon juice and red chillies and keep aside.
2. Then add the garlic and keep aside.
3. After that pour red wine, dashes of Tabasco and honey.
4. Now take a pan and cook the chicken in a tablespoon of oil. When it's almost done, add dried oregano.
5. For Enchilada Sauce:
6. Blend the charred garlic, onion, tomato puree, green chillies and coriander in a mixer.
7. Heat oil, add this mixture, saute for a few minutes.
8. Then add the water, salt and pepper, and simmer on low heat for 10 minutes. It will thicken to resemble a creamy texture.
9. To put together the enchilada, slather sauce on the tortilla, then add the cooked enchilada chicken, roll it and pour enchilada sauce on top.
10. Then top with the two cheeses.
11. Stack these in flat bottomed glass bowl and bake till the cheese melts.

title: Guilt Free Chicken Tacos Recipe
method: 1. Marinate chicken in garlic, lemon juice and taco seasoning for a few hours. Then take a pan and in one tablespoon of oil, fry the chicken till its cooked.
2. Now instead of a taco, place the chicken in a lettuce cup, wrap and roll.
3. Top with salsa and dip.
4. Alternatively, place this chicken on tortilla chips and serve.
1. Take a crisp lettuce cup, put the cooked chicken in it first. Then add a dollop of salsa followed by a dollop of Mexican yoghurt dip. Don't put the dip first, it will make the lettuce soggy.
2. If you don't want to eat lettuce, you can put the cooked taco chicken on tortilla chips, and add a touch of dip and salsa and serve as finger food.
3. If you buy a ready made tortilla packet from the market, do not reheat them on high heat, they will turn brittle if you overcook them. Just cook them on low heat.

title: Shikarpuri Chatkhana Karhai Recipe
method: 1. Wash and clean the chicken.
2. Saute ginger and garlic in ghee, and put in the chicken.
3. Fry for 2 minutes and then put all the spices except garam masala, along with tomato, onion and green chillies. Now cook on slow flame.
4. Then put yoghurt and saute well till little dry, and then add garam masala and cook for 2-3 minutes.
5. Garnish with green coriander and serve hot with rotis.

title: Dhaniya Murgh Recipe
method: 1. Clean and trim the chicken.
2. Heat ghee in a lagan. Add ginger, chili and ginger garlic paste, and fry it.
3. Add the chicken and saute well till browned.
4. Add salt, turmeric, cumin powder, coriander powder, deggi mirch, yellow chili, kasoori methi.
5. Add some chicken stock and cook the mixture.
6. Remove the chicken, when the mixture dries up and keep warm.
7. Now, add yoghurt, brown onions, bhunna masala, cashewnut paste, pounded coriander seeds and coriander roots. Cook till masala leaves oil.
8. Now add the chicken and chicken stock, and cook on a slow flame till chicken is cooked.
9. Add garam masala powder and green cardamom powder.
10. Finish with cream, coriander seeds. Serve hot.

title: Dum Murgh Keema Baingan Recipe
method: 1. Saute sliced onion in desi ghee. Add ginger paste and garlic paste. Add all spices.
2. Add tomato, after the ingredients are tender and spices are cooked. Add chicken mince.
3. Fry the diced eggplant.
4. Then add mixed pickle.
5. Add tamarind paste. Cook until tender.
6. Garnish with chopped coriander, julienne ginger and green chilli.
7. Serve with jeera rice.

title: Chicken Shaami Kebab Recipe
method: 1. Boil the chana dal along with chicken thigh cubes and spices. Let the chicken cook.
2. Strain and keep aside to cool.
3. Then add 3 eggs, chopped coriander, mint, green chillies, ginger and garlic.
4. Mix well and mince.
5. Make round shape kebabs of the mixture.
6. Coat the kebabs in the remaining eggs slightly, and pan fry them in oil.
7. One can serve this with mint chutney or tamarind chutney.

title: Tandoori Tikka Seel Kand Recipe
method: 1. Take the chicken breast & flatten with steak hammer like minute steak.
2. Slice capsicum, onion, tomato and cheese.
3. Stuff the chicken flat piccata with 3 slices of each pepper, onion, cheese and mint. Keep it in
4. the center of chicken piccata and roll it.
5. Take yoghurt, cream, ginger paste, garlic paste, red chilli powder, garam masala and yellow
6. food colouring. Make a paste.
7. Dip the rolled chicken in it & keep in chiller for at least 15 minutes.
1. Boil the potato. Chop some black olives, green coriander, mint and spring onion.
2. Add these and sundried tomatoes, cream to the boiled potato and mash it.
3. Make a roll of the mashed potato and cut into equal size (1 inch) pieces, and sear on a hot platter.
1. Put three potato slices or mini cakes in the plate lengthwise.
2. Grill the chicken & put on each of potato cake. Serve.

title: Chana Aur Khatte Pyaaz Ka Murgh Recipe
method: 1. Marinate the chicken pieces with ginger-garlic paste as required, salt, lemon juice and dry spices.
2. Boil the chickpeas with bay leaf and turmeric powder. Once the chickpeas is boiled, cool it in a bowl.
3. Take a pan and add ghee, marinated chicken and cook it for some time till it is golden brown.
4. Take oil in a separate pan and heat the oil. Now add cumin seeds, onions and whole garam masala.
5. Once the onions are gold brown add the remaining ginger garlic paste.
6. Add the tomatoes and cook for a while. Now add the chana and cook for 10 minutes.
7. Once it is done, grind the onions-tomato masala with ginger, green chillies into a paste and pass through a sieve.
8. Add some yoghurt, mint and cook again for a while. Finish with adding
9. the chicken and the cream.
10. Garnish with coriander and sliced pickle onions.
1. Make dough with the maida, carom seeds, salt, oil and little water as required.
2. Make dumpling, roll as a flat bread and cook it on a tawa.
3. Garnish with the fresh herbs.
